name: Targetter Free Online Game
description: Target Games Announces Targetter , a new hyper casual activity Target Games has announced targetter , a new casual game that is activities in which players send an object toward a target while avoiding any obstacles. By playing these games, participants will learn the key skills and strategies for games such as Croquet, Golf, Archery, Boccia, Curling and Bowling. Targetter is simple and fast - just send the object toward the target and avoid any obstacles! - and it's all with high-quality skills and strategies.
